name: docker-hello
description: Basic hello world application for Node.js
author: Robbie Minshall <rjminsha@us.ibm.com>

scripts.test: nyc mocha --exit -R spec  test/test-page.js 2>&1 | tee report
scripts.test3: mocha test/test-page.js --reporter json --reporter-options output=report.json | tee report.json
